sentences.sentence: In clast IC sediments particle size is an important factor.
sentences.translation: 在碎屑沉积物中，颗粒大小是个重要因素。

sentences.sentence: To go to the first error, type: cfirst in ESC mode; to go to every subsequent error, use: cn; to go to the last error, type: clast.
sentences.translation: 在ESC模式下输入：cfirst跳到第一个错误；使用：cn跳到后续的错误；使用：clast跳到最后一个错误。

sentences.sentence: This course stresses those aspects of clast ic sedimentary petrology and sedimentology which have application to the petroleum geologist.
sentences.translation: 该课程着重对石油地质师有用的碎屑沉积岩石学和沉积学。
